function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Participants of the study classified into different groups of physical activity may have different levels of exposure to contagious diseases based on their activity levels.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission due to varying levels of physical activity.","Mitigation":"Encourage all participants to follow recommended hygiene and safety measures to reduce the risk of disease transmission.","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Participants of the study, especially those with low physical activity levels.","Owner":"Research team and healthcare professionals."},{"Description":"Subjective perception of well-being during COVID-19 emergency may reflect the psychological impact of the pandemic on the participants.","Impact":"Potential mental health challenges and distress among participants due to the ongoing COVID-19 emergency.","Mitigation":"Provide mental health support and resources to participants experiencing distress.","Technologies":"Telemedicine, online counseling services, and mental health apps.","People":"Participants of the study.","Owner":"Research team, mental health professionals, and healthcare providers."},{"Description":"Use of statistical analysis software may introduce errors in data interpretation and reporting.","Impact":"Inaccurate study findings and conclusions due to software-related errors.","Mitigation":"Thoroughly validate the statistical analysis tools and results to ensure accuracy.","Technologies":"Statistical validation tools and peer review processes.","People":"Research team and statistical analysts.","Owner":"Research team and statistical analysts."}]}
